item.description:
I am planning on heading up to Wachusett to see if it would be a good snow-shoeing destination for the group. I don't have any plans as far as trails go, so if anyone wants to join me we can decide together. Here is a link to the trail map: http://www.mass.gov/d...

 

Bring all the normal required gear for a fall hike and lunch, snacks and water. I'm planning on a 4 to 5 hour hike. I'll be at the parking lot on Bolton Road by the Bolton Pond trail around 9:30. Give me a call or a text if you want to car pool. 508-446-0211
item.name: Wachusett Mountain Hike
